smtp.email: Enter the email to be used for sending tokens

captcha.PUBKEY: Enter your google captcha site key
captcha.PRVKEY: Enter your google captcha private key

accesstoken.description: This is the description above the form
accesstoken.invalid_email: This message warns of an email with an incorrect format
accesstoken.invalid_captcha: This message warns of an error with the captcha
accesstoken.invalid_form: This message warns that a form cannot be resubmitted

messages.accesstokensuccess: Success message displayed after an access token request

accesstokenconfirm.failure: Message in case of link expiration

email.title: Email title
email.ignore: Ignore message in the case of wrong mail
email.html_message: Message displayed in the case HTML email is not supported, the link is concatenated to this string
